title: No pain. The Long shot
creator_contributor_role: Alfred J Hitchcock Productions, production company
description: Episode number 2 of Series "Alfred Hitchcock presents". Two episodes of this fine series on one tape. "No pain": A paralysed millionaire living in a respirator has a beautiful, young wife. Her straying nature tempts her to pull the plug... will she won't she? Stars Brian Keith. "The Long shot": A compulsive gambler, broke and in debt has a loan shark after him, when he fortunately finds a job advertisement for a driver. Seeing it as the perfect way to get out of town he poses as a Londoner, to convince his prospective employer that he is the man for the job. During the journey, he sees that his employer has a bag full of money... what will he be tempted to do? Stars Peter Lawford.
related_objects: Series; S01132; Alfred Hitchcock presents; Active; 1955
